details.description_text: Product Type: Saree Main Material: Dhupian Silk Sharee Style: Regular Saree Color: Same As Picture Best Quality Long: 13 Haat Saree Bohor: 46 inch Product Size : Saree - 4.80 mtrs No Lace Will Be Fitted Authentic Color Occasion: Casual, Party & Festive Product color may slightly vary due to photographic lighting sources or your monitor settings. #ShareeForWomen Moslin Than Saree for Women Introducing our Fashionable, Exclusive Stylish and Gorgeous Saree – a timeless masterpiece that embodies elegance and charm. This saree, crafted with meticulous hand printing in the traditional style, is a perfect blend of sophistication and cultural richness.Key Features:- Versatile Elegance: Suitable for all seasons, this saree radiates elegance throughout the year, making it a versatile choice for every woman.- Regular Saree Style: The regular saree style ensures a classic drape that complements various body types, creating a flattering silhouette.- Premium Material: Exclusive Fashionable Saree in Lucrative Color, the saree offers a luxurious feel, enhancing your overall comfort and style.Product Details:- Material: Soft Silk- Length: 13 Haat Saree with a 46-inch border, providing ample fabric for an exquisite drape.- Size: Saree length of 4.80 meters, allowing for graceful and elaborate draping.- Lace-Free Design: Embracing simplicity, the saree is designed without lace, focusing on the beauty of hand printing.- No Matching Blouse Piece: This saree comes without a matching blouse piece, allowing you the freedom to pair it with your preferred blouse.- Occasion Versatility:Perfect for a range of occasions, from casual outings to festive celebrations and parties, this saree effortlessly blends tradition with contemporary style.Caution/Special Instruction:For your satisfaction, please note that due to light and screen settings, the item's color may vary slightly from the pictures.-- Step into the world of timeless elegance with our Exclusive and Gorgeous Saree – a celebration of craftsmanship and style that complements the beauty of every woman.
